Package coldbox.system.core.mail

Class Summary
AbstractProtocol An abstract class that give identity to mail protocols when building custom or extending mail protocols the Mail Service uses
Mail I model a cfmail object with extra pizzazz
MailService The ColdBox Mail Service used to send emails in an oo and ColdBoxy fashion
MailSettingsBean I model mail server settings to be used with our Mail Service
